message.content:
cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.DS 

Reasoning: The paper proposes new measures of shared, unique, and synergistic information that can be used to decompose the mutual information of a pair of random variables with a third random variable. This topic is related to information theory (cs.IT), machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and data science (cs.DS). Additionally, the paper discusses the properties and comparisons of the proposed measures, which are relevant to the sub-category of statistical inference (cs.SI).
